imdb.plot outline: A parody of American film directors throughout the 20th century and a meditation on cinema history. Each of the 12 stories shares a similar cast and basic premise: "A man walks into a bar..." Yet, every episode is completely unique in its interpretation of the director's style, technique, content, and genre. From film noir to musical comedy, Charlie Chaplin to Steven Spielberg, "A Man Walks Into A Bar" offers a crash course in cinema history in 12 episodes.
imdb.title: A Man Walks Into a Bar
akas: A Man Walks Into a Bar (United States)
plot: A parody of American film directors throughout the 20th century and a meditation on cinema history. Each of the 12 stories shares a similar cast and basic premise: "A man walks into a bar..."::Peter Garafalo
